{{attention|ja|This entire entry needs quite a bit of expansion and reorganization.}}

# [[place]]

====Usage notes====
* '''しょ''': This reading is used in [[on'yomi]] compounds.
*: Examples:
*:* {{l|ja|市役所}} (しやく'''しょ''', shiyaku'''sho'''): [[city hall]] (literally, "'''place''' where city duties happen")
*:* {{l|ja|事務所}} (じむ'''しょ''', jimu'''sho'''): [[office]] (literally, "'''place''' where business duties happen")
* '''ところ''', '''どころ''': These readings are used in [[kun'yomi]] compounds. The ''tokoro'' reading often changes to ''dokoro'' in compounds due to [[rendaku]].
*: Examples:
*:* {{l|ja|国所}} (くに'''ところ''', kuni'''tokoro'''): [[country]] of [[birth]], [[birthplace]]
*:* {{l|ja|所々}} (ところ'''どころ''', tokoro'''dokoro'''): [[places]], [[here and there]]
